website_summaries.verdict: Easy to clean mat is fairly basic and not as well-reviewed as others on this list.
pros: Comfortable to lay on and walk on barefoot
cons: Takes longer to dry out than other brands

customer_reviews.title: This rug is huge!
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a new rug for my patio & somehow clicked on RV rugs, had never known about these. As usual, I sifted thru tons of reviews and customer pictures & decided to try it. I was already prepared for the creases in the rug thanks to several reviews mentioning it but I wasn't prepared for how large it was am extremely happy about that. We had a 5×8 out here before but the rug offers so much more coverage and I'm walking on it now without shoes & it's so comfortable underfoot. It cleans up easily and is very lightweight but stays put if that makes sense. I'm going to purchase another for the front porch.
customer_reviews.author: D. W. Fleury

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Wow, this is much bigger than I pictured. The blue colors looks great. I am using this on my deck, under a patio set. When it arrived all folded up (not sure why it doesn't come rolled) I immediately rolled it up and let it sit over night. This helped a bit with the creases. It also has some loops on each end to tack it down. I got a different one from another seller that was only 4 X 6 and almost the same price. Not sure how long it will hold up but, for the price it was so worth it.
customer_reviews.author: CatrineTop Contributor: Baking

customer_reviews.title: Keeps Campsite Clean but folds are terrible.
customer_reviews.text: This mat serves our purpose for a decent size Campsite rug. We do not have a lot of storage so we needed something that could be rolled up and small. The mat is plastic and keeps the Campsite clean but the folds on it will make you trip constantly!! I'm hoping they disappear & the mat lays flat after some use. This will NOT hold up to outdoor patio use with daily sun.
customer_reviews.author: CampGolfEat

customer_reviews.title: Bought this to use as an outdoor rug. The ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to use as an outdoor rug. The one I was looking at was $129. Thought I'd try this first due to the difference in price. No difference in quality but saved a ton of money.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Rollins

customer_reviews.title: Perfectly priced outdoor rug
customer_reviews.text: We required an outdoor rug for our covered porch which would withstand constant dog and kid activity while protecting our deck from the outdoor furniture. We wanted something inexpensive and easy to clean. This is perfect. It is a beautiful, large outdoor material designed to withstand activity. It does have wrinkles which take time to flatten out because we do not have it staked to the ground as it might have been intended. It would move and slide if we did not have heavy furniture and pots on it. But that is okay! Being a dog and kid family, we needed something to make our space livable and attractive. Thank you, this is perfect!
customer_reviews.author: coin555

customer_reviews.title: GREAT DEAL for the size and quality
customer_reviews.text: GREAT DEAL for the size and quality. First off, this pattern brightens up my aged cape cod grey deck. The size of this mat is perfect for my 6 person rectangular table. There is enough room to generously pull out all of the chairs away from the table and still be comfortably on the mat. Not to mention, this plastic material is ideal wood decks. The quick dry ensures that no wood rot will occur as it can with traditional outdoor rugs. We attached each corner to the wood deck to secure it and so far, it has held up in some windy, rainy summer storms.
customer_reviews.author: Jaime

customer_reviews.title: Great for outdoor patio coverage
customer_reviews.text: Used this for outdoor patio and so far so good. Wanted to cover up a large area of our deck and it looks great. Just kind of bends up around the edges, doesn’t lay perfectly flat since it’s so thin. But since it wasn’t made specifically for decks, it was a great find. Much less expensive than your typical outdoor rug that gets moldy and worn after each summer. This rug cleans easily and does not get musty and worn looking. We have a pool, so it gets wet a lot and so far it has not stayed damp. Great purchase.
customer_reviews.author: JES

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and practical.
customer_reviews.text: We were looking for a patio mat throughout the summer and when I saw this one thought it would complement our patio nicely. It looks beautiful and fits the area well. The pattern and colors look great for summer under the blue sky. Easy to sweep and clean. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Artwark

customer_reviews.title: All around great addition to our patio
customer_reviews.text: Love this mat so far! We have it under out patio set on a cement patio to cover up all the crack in the cement. Does the job. Make sure to pick up chairs to pull them out from the table, dragging them out could possibly cause the mat to tear. It's comfortable enough for bare feet. Dog and cat have both laid out on it. All around great addition to our patio.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: why didn't I know about these sooner?
customer_reviews.text: wow.....I can't believe Ive been suffering through indoor /outdoor carpeting for years.....stays wet , stains, develops mold...these camp mats are wonderful! water goes right thru ...hoses off perfectly ...stains don't even begin to happen ...comfortable on your feet. and all the new prints are fantastic. I have two on my deck and thrilled! telling all my friends
customer_reviews.author: C C.

customer_reviews.title: Great for sandy camping spots.
customer_reviews.text: Such a great mat to have while camping at the beach. It kept much of the sand out of my trailer and I found I could sweep it easily. If it rained, the water went through the rig immediately. One of the best things I have bought for beach camping.
customer_reviews.author: Lori

customer_reviews.title: Great Mat
customer_reviews.text: Great matt. Easy to sweep, light weight, easy to fold up. Made of material that resmebles some sort of plastic nylon so it wont get moldy. Very happy I bought this for my travel trailer. Side note dont put it to close to your fire. An amber from the fire put a tiny hole in mine. You would think that the company would make them fire retardant, but that's on me. The matt was approximately 3 feet away from our fire.
customer_reviews.author: NW83

customer_reviews.title: Better than Dirt
customer_reviews.text: Great item for anyone who wants to go outside of their RV when camping and not bring the "outside" back "inside" when returning. Bright color, easy to clean either with a broom or hose it off with water. Quick drying. Smaller size makes it great to roll up and store, almost anyplace you want. Gives your RV that "welcome" feel and helps to keep you and your RV cleaner. Corners of mat have tabs that can be used to "spike" it down on those windy days, better than placing rocks on the corners only to trip over. Best of all... it's reversable, just so you can change it up.
customer_reviews.author: annk

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Love this mat! I actually don’t care that it’s made out of plastic at all. It’s a beautiful color/pattern, is huge, easy to clean, comfortable to sit and stand barefoot on, and my dog won’t pee on it (like a rug). You can’t beat the value for the price, and it’s perfect for your patio if you are good with the material. This photo was taken just after we got it, and after a week the folds are less visible. Great buy!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase for camping.
customer_reviews.text: So nice to have a comfortable surface like this for camping with kids. Easy to wash or sweep. The folds settle down pretty quickly, though they remain somewhat visible. I used various tables and chairs on this in my high traffic camp. Everything was good expect this metal bistro table and chairs with thin metal legs were unsuitable for this mat over soft natural terrain, they did a bit of damage. So the thing is not indestructable. Still really happy with it!
customer_reviews.author: JM

customer_reviews.title: Second time purchasing
customer_reviews.text: I had one like this that lasted a few years that cost a fraction of what many are selling for. This one I've had for about a month. It's so easy to clean, resilient to massive sun exposure, and no one can beat the cost! See the light damage on the furniture cover that is a year old.
customer_reviews.author: Travelbuzz

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight and cover a large area.
customer_reviews.text: If you need a lightweight solution to cover ground for picnics, etc., this is your pick. If it's not too windy, it can also be used as a rug on patios. Or you could pin down with a planter. A good way to cover a large area quick and cheaply.
customer_reviews.author: J. M.

customer_reviews.title: Nice size
customer_reviews.text: Honestly it’s a nice size for the price and I used the hose to clean. Fits great on a deck. Would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: WashingtonCaps

customer_reviews.title: Great product for price
customer_reviews.text: We used as a rug outside of our tent on a crushed rock/ sand site. We were very pleased. Kept the sand and rocks out of the tent and provided comfortable place to sit. However, the plastic weave is light weight and if you were barefooted could still feel the rocks. Loved that I could easily lift it and shake off the debris. I don't think it will be super durable but definitely does the job for the money. Would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: So far, has worn well even in rain and snow.
customer_reviews.text: Works well on my cement walkway to my home. Love the color as it goes well with the color of my house. Layed flat after a few hours in the sun and hardly moves when walked on. Bought my first one for my backyard cement driveway which is not looking too good, but now it does and it is easy to sweep clean.
customer_reviews.author: Jo Ann Andrews

customer_reviews.title: Under a kiddie pool
customer_reviews.text: We use this for our screen tent and put it under the kiddie pool, thicker than a tarp and it looks nicer.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Cute but not durable
customer_reviews.text: Really cute and great price but we had a muddy area we tried to use it on and it was covered in mud right away. Wouldn’t come off very easily either. This would be a great buy for a deck or something though. Great price and vibrant colors
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Durable
customer_reviews.text: We purchased ours to go with our outdoor gazebo and furniture. It has been through a Maine winter, covered in feet and feet and feet of snow, and it still is looking good and seems perfectly fine. I'm happy with it
customer_reviews.author: NW

customer_reviews.title: Good carpet protection
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to put in our back room where our dogs come in and out and has been great keeping our carpets clean and not tracking dirt everywhere. Also super easy to clean.
customer_reviews.author: AndyLynn81

customer_reviews.title: Great mat for patio
customer_reviews.text: Love this his Matt it looks s easy to clean and light weight. I only wish it came with corner weights. The wind really whips through my back patio and the next morning I have to straight it out!
customer_reviews.author: Darlene Todd

customer_reviews.title: Great Item
customer_reviews.text: This rug looks great on our side porch! It didn't take long at all for the folds and wrinkles to come out once it was stretched out on the floor! A great price on a great item!
customer_reviews.author: Debbie

customer_reviews.title: Last one was great. This one is terrible.
customer_reviews.text: I really don't want to write a bad review, but I previously purchased the black/white oriental rug. It was wonderful! Lasted over a year! Never bunched up or ripped and was super easy to clean... I got this one. Terrible. This lasted for two months. I got ripped, was hard to clean, and it bunched up constantly. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Bonni McNaughton

customer_reviews.title: Should have bought one a long time ago
customer_reviews.text: We recently switched from tent camping to trailer camping but honestly anyone who spends time outdoors should get one of these. Great surface for in front of the tent or trailer. Easy to sweep off and also makes a great outdoor play mat for the little one.
customer_reviews.author: ibarrasread

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: Really impressed with this patio upgrade! Stylish and will hold up against PNW moisture factor. Chevron style is very cool. Pretty sure you need this . Much better than fake grass or fake carpet .
customer_reviews.author: DJ Patricia

customer_reviews.title: Thin and breaks easily
customer_reviews.text: It’s really pretty and I do like it but as soon as you move a chair over the rug, it splits. Haven’t had the rug more than a month and there are tears everywhere. I have it under an awning and thought it would be protected but nope, should have spent more for better quality.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa

customer_reviews.title: Great outdoor option.
customer_reviews.text: I put this under and little play structure where there was dirt and has been a great option to keep my kids off the dirt and a softer ground to sit on. Really durable and love the pattern and color.
customer_reviews.author: Kristen

customer_reviews.title: Lupe's to anchor it to the ground.
customer_reviews.text: It's great to put out at the doorstep of your RV if the ground is dirt or Sandy. Water can run through it but it doesn't dry fast.
customer_reviews.author: chez

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size for camping
customer_reviews.text: Pretty shade of blue and was just the right size to use in sandy area under our camper awning on our recent camping trip. Bought spikes to secure it so nobody would trip on it. Was easy to sweep off and keep clean and easy to roll up and put away.
customer_reviews.author: Petunia

customer_reviews.title: Great Alternative to Pouring a New Patio
customer_reviews.text: These served as great patio covers for a recent BBQ. The colors are vibrant and the material is nice to walk on in your bare feet. They have been out on the patio all summer and have not faded. I haven't checked to see if they have become brittle. I hope not as I'd like to reuse them next year.
customer_reviews.author: SunnyOne

customer_reviews.title: Buy it!
customer_reviews.text: This rug is awesome! I got the big one for our covered deck and it's perfect. The colors are perfect and my dogs love it! Great price!
customer_reviews.author: Sass

customer_reviews.title: Great for camping
customer_reviews.text: We bought this to use outside our RV for camping. The blue color is beautiful and it’s a great ground cover.
customer_reviews.author: okmichele

customer_reviews.title: Best may/rug for camping
customer_reviews.text: We love this rug! Use if for camping. You can hose it down and water goes through. You can sweep it easy. And your feet stay clean. Very easy to port around. And it’s huge. But can fold down of down t need that much. Love!
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly Santana

customer_reviews.title: Fold lines are difficult to remove even after months
customer_reviews.text: Cannot get the fold lines to go away. I have tried everything. This is on my deck so I am thinking of actually stapling it down.
customer_reviews.author: Cody Darr

customer_reviews.title: quality
customer_reviews.text: the rug is pretty, has good coverage, weather resistant, and easy to keep clean. however, it is thin and the woven fabric could be tighter because the patio furniture feet can make their way through.
customer_reviews.author: Debora

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight.  Camping type rug.
customer_reviews.text: Definitely a camping rug or for temporary use at home. Plastic feeling. Looks ok but will not last on patio.
customer_reviews.author: DonnaDav

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for NO BO
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for my NO BO camper, looks awesome and easy to use. Cover the ground and very comfortable to walk on. Whish it would come with it's own steaks. I would recommend
customer_reviews.author: Craig

customer_reviews.title: Do not purchase this product. Color is not as pictured
customer_reviews.text: The color is not as described. Ordered a brown one. The color is more salmon pink than brown. I feel that I was deceived. The color is that off.
customer_reviews.author: Carol

customer_reviews.title: Color is different.
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this rug to go outside in my Gazebo. The color was supposed to be Brown but it is in fact Burgundy! Very disappointed!
customer_reviews.author: Essence T.

customer_reviews.title: Best thing ever
customer_reviews.text: I love this mat it is hugh big enough to put under my tent and still have space in front. the kids love laying on it when we camp ans easy to rinse off.
customer_reviews.author: Nikko

customer_reviews.title: Works better than regular indoor outdoor carpet for camping
customer_reviews.text: It works great for camping instead of heavy carpets that take a long time to dry out when it rains
customer_reviews.author: Blondie

customer_reviews.title: Great mat
customer_reviews.text: The mat works perfectly in our backyard, I ended up buying another one since we loved it.
customer_reviews.author: C walker

customer_reviews.title: Love it!!
customer_reviews.text: It’s huge and perfect for outdoor areas! Light weight so will need weighted down with furniture or staked down. It comes with loops to stake it into the ground. Definitely recommend!!
customer_reviews.author: Codi

customer_reviews.title: Pleased with product
customer_reviews.text: Only used a couple of times. If using on grass get stakes as slides across and doesn’t stay put due to backing. Held up great so far
customer_reviews.author: Tammy L. Neher

customer_reviews.title: Does the trick...
customer_reviews.text: Decent outdoor rug. For the price it's not half bad.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great rug for our deck!
customer_reviews.text: This rug is so durable and looks great on our deck! It is made from plastic but that is a great thing as it won't mildew. The sun does not make it hot like other rugs we have used in the past. Going to order another one!
customer_reviews.author: Heidi Harvey

customer_reviews.title: Great outdoor rug for the $.
customer_reviews.text: I love this outdoor rug. I’m using it on my back patio and am enjoying it, as are my fur children. Easy to care for, and doesn’t break the bank.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Reasonably priced
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for our outdoor patio. Wish it was rolled instead of folded. Creases don't let in lay flat all the way.
customer_reviews.author: Elaina Stockton

customer_reviews.title: Great reversible outdoor rug!
customer_reviews.text: Seems like a good outdoor rug. I bought it towards the end of camping season. It kept leaves and gravel out of the camper!
customer_reviews.author: Paula

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay for....
customer_reviews.text: Purchased two for my aging outdoor deck, they are comfortable to walk on, but very cheaply made. They are already showing signs of coming apart after only 2 months.
customer_reviews.author: Peekn

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it
customer_reviews.text: To light and Double sided tape would keep it down So light it wrinkles and becomes a tripping hazard
customer_reviews.author: Brian

customer_reviews.title: Nice rug
customer_reviews.text: Love the color and ease of cleaning it. We use it while Rving with our kiddos and it allows us the space we need to remove shoes and easy clean up after our kiddos.
customer_reviews.author: Marina Stone

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful rug
customer_reviews.text: Great rug. So happy I purchased instead of a traditional outdoor rug. So easy to clean, easy on bare feet, awesome quality, highly recommend it is just beautiful
customer_reviews.author: Shari BMore

customer_reviews.title: Good buy
customer_reviews.text: We purchased two of these for our camper. They’re fantastic. Light weight and practical. Easy to store and helps keep the wilderness outside your rv
customer_reviews.author: Em in Idaho

customer_reviews.title: Easy to Clean Mat
customer_reviews.text: I use this mat on my patio. It’s easy to clean and looks very nice
customer_reviews.author: Eugene

customer_reviews.title: Feels good underfoot. but plan on getting a new one every year.
customer_reviews.text: not that durable or UV resistant for continuous use as a porch rug. but it's nice for the summer
customer_reviews.author: Nicholas Cooper

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it
customer_reviews.text: This came out of the package with little tears in the the rug, like the material it’s made out of just sort of fell apart in spots.
customer_reviews.author: LjC

customer_reviews.title: Easy to clean , looks really nice too x
customer_reviews.text: Looks amazing on my patio. Love it , highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Dee361

customer_reviews.title: Easy clean
customer_reviews.text: For the price ..it's not heavy..feels good under the feet..looks great..easy to clean..I live in the mountains easy clean is a must..bear pooped on it..a little water washed it away..like I said..I live on a mountain
customer_reviews.author: Jammie Johansen

customer_reviews.title: Definitely worth the money
customer_reviews.text: This is a perfect patios/deck rug. It keeps our feet cool and looks great
customer_reviews.author: Dandy Blagg

customer_reviews.title: great value. great price.
customer_reviews.text: this held up n worked great on my back deck. cleans up nicely. great purchase.
customer_reviews.author: favoritecolorisblue

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and pretty too
customer_reviews.text: This is sturdy and the color is vibrant. We have had numerous people remark on it. The dirt just sifts through, larger debris can easily be swept off. It's soft on our feet and folds easily for storage.
customer_reviews.author: shopr

customer_reviews.title: Nice mat!
customer_reviews.text: This arrived in a timely manner and is a very nice mat. We are happy with our purchase.
customer_reviews.author: RMalzahn

customer_reviews.title: These are great to add extra "at home" feel to you temporary ...
customer_reviews.text: Have a larger one of these already. Bought the smaller one so that it will fit properly inside of my Add-a-Room when I attach it to my 8'x10' awning. These are great to add extra "at home" feel to you temporary home. They do help keep down the amount of dirt that gets inside the camper as well.
customer_reviews.author: rottentaco

customer_reviews.title: Holds up, easy to set out.
customer_reviews.text: So far this has held up at the track with our motorcycles parked on it. Perfect for out pit.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Gold

customer_reviews.title: Works great on an older outdoor wood deck
customer_reviews.text: I use this on my outdoor wood deck it works great keeps the deck looking great, not too expensive, hose it off and it drys in 15 minutes. Kids can play on it without getting splinters.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Patio mat
customer_reviews.text: I LIke the mat, however it does not let water drain through so it just sits on top and puddles in the low spots.
customer_reviews.author: Brian F

customer_reviews.title: 1000% would buy again
customer_reviews.text: Doggie approved! This thing is huge! And the best part about it is it's not a carpet/rug, it's like a woven mat, so water goes right through
customer_reviews.author: Melissa

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Quality
customer_reviews.text: Doesn't mold or mildew, sturdy and comfortable on bare feet.
customer_reviews.author: Kristy

customer_reviews.title: Looks great easy to clean
customer_reviews.text: Love the rug ... easy to clean just hose it down and done great value
customer_reviews.author: Melinda Rivera

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful pattern. Size is great
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful pattern. Size is great. Used it to go camping and had plenty of room to put a table and several chairs for our family to sit and enjoy. The weave is very tight and can be easily cleaned. Great purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Julene Hollenbach

customer_reviews.title: Nice size, great color
customer_reviews.text: This rug was a great buy! It covers very ugly patio.
customer_reviews.author: Ava

customer_reviews.title: Functional, pretty and even makes a child’s play mat!
customer_reviews.text: Love the design and colors, and having it in front of my tent to minimize dirt entering tent. Children also love to use it to play on!
customer_reviews.author: MELODY

customer_reviews.title: Great Addition to My Outdoor Patio Furniture
customer_reviews.text: Great outdoor rug. Especially if you live in a warm climate.
customer_reviews.author: Sweetness

customer_reviews.title: Functional and vibrant
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this in the winter because I love the color. It works well and drains well. It's been out for two weeks and so far it has held up well.
customer_reviews.author: 2 in College

customer_reviews.title: I have had this outside for months and it works ...
customer_reviews.text: I have had this outside for months and it works really well; no fading, and no moisture retention underneath or mildew.
customer_reviews.author: Darth Heather

customer_reviews.title: Looks great!
customer_reviews.text: Very large patio rug that works well on our back porch. Still has some creases but getting better.
customer_reviews.author: BananaMcGee

customer_reviews.title: Great, but...
customer_reviews.text: The only CON is that the rug is too light and the wind blows it constantly. Other than that it is ideal for the terrace. You will have to place heavy items like planters or chairs around it.
customer_reviews.author: Ruben Mir

customer_reviews.title: Discolored and cheap as cheap can buy!!
customer_reviews.text: This rug is awful!! It is discolored and the black outline is not all the way around the edges!! However, we needed something ASAP to replace the old dirty rug we had so it had to go down!! Cheap is what we paid for and cheap is what we got!! Terrible purchase!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for RV camping!!!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect fit (9x12) in front of our pop up camper!! Colors are as in picture !! Definitely recommend this product !
customer_reviews.author: jwolfe

customer_reviews.title: Worked on our deck like a charm
customer_reviews.text: Worked on our deck like a charm. Screwed it down so no one could pull the rug out from under me. JOKE!
customer_reviews.author: Larry Marshall Meadors

customer_reviews.title: Great price for a great outdoor rug
customer_reviews.text: Great price for a great outdoor rug. I use this camping and it is working wonderfully so far - about a month!
customer_reviews.author: Jen S.

customer_reviews.title: You will love it!
customer_reviews.text: Could not be more happier with the price and quality of this product! Love it!! It looks amazing outside me 5th wheel!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not what I  expected
customer_reviews.text: This outdoor mat is not what I expected it to be... It’s a very foam like... I had it down for a week and it would not lay flat So I repurchased another one
customer_reviews.author: Char

customer_reviews.title: RV rug
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my son and he said he really likes it and uses it all the time
customer_reviews.author: Cheri Klotz

customer_reviews.title: Nice!
customer_reviews.text: Used it to cover most of our deck. It is very light weight. The colors are more vibrant than they appear in photos. It should last one season.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie N.

customer_reviews.title: Pleasantly surprised!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this specifically for our back porch. We have a concrete pad and covering and I wanted something with this pattern to match my patio cushion set. This carpet is much larger than I expected so I was pleasantly surprised. Light weight, easy to clean, and easy to move.
customer_reviews.author: Holly F. Cottrell

customer_reviews.title: Reversible Camco carpet.
customer_reviews.text: I have not used the carpet but it’s ecsectly what I was looking for for our RV. Nice color and size carpet.
customer_reviews.author: Bruce Irwin

customer_reviews.title: Great rug, loved the colors
customer_reviews.text: Great rug, loved the colors! They only thing that keeps this from 5 stars, is that after a month I still haven’t been able to get rid of all the creases. I would definitely buy again!
customer_reviews.author: Mommaof6

customer_reviews.title: Tightly-woven and sturdy!
customer_reviews.text: I picked this color and design to compliment our camper awning. It has creases when unpacked but I layed it out on my sunny driveway for a couple days. That seemed to relax the creases. I rolled it up rather than refolding it to keep it crease-free. It feels good underfoot.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice and price is good.
customer_reviews.text: Now I did order this and it worked perfect for my deck.
customer_reviews.author: Betty did not order that.

customer_reviews.title: Get it!
customer_reviews.text: This is my first review but I love this patio rug so much I had to write about it. It’s so easy to clean and the color so far is still very vibrant.
customer_reviews.author: Donnette Williams

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality
customer_reviews.text: Will do the job for a camping rug but overall quality is poor. Many snags and runs in the plastic. For almost $50 would expect better
customer_reviews.author: Vick

customer_reviews.title: Great Mat
customer_reviews.text: I needed something to go under my patio furniture and lay on concrete. This works great!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love, love love
customer_reviews.text: I love the size...9 feet...big enough several chairs fit. Folds easily and rinses off with hose. Definitely the best addition to our camping experience!!
customer_reviews.author: Sharon Brown

customer_reviews.title: Love these rugs
customer_reviews.text: Love these rugs. This is our second one. 1 for the camper and one for the deck. Easy to clean.
customer_reviews.author: Chreeve

product_meta.title: Camco 42858 Blue Chevron Design 9' x 12' Reversible Outdoor Mat
product_meta.description: Size:9' x 12'| Color:Blue ChevronThe Camco Reversible RV Awning & Outdoor Mat is the perfect outdoor accessory for RVing, camping, picnicking, the beach and patios. Use it to help keep dirt from being tracked into your RV or home, as a beach or picnic mat or even as a tent pad. The mat measures 9-feet x 12-feet and is made from lightweight, mildew resistant, breathable material that will not trap rain or snow. UV-coated, it features a unique, reversible design. Easy to fold and store. Cleans easily with soap and water.
feature_bullets: Multi-Purpose Outdoor Mat: Use it to help keep dirt from being tracked into your RV or home, as a beach or picnic mat or even as a tent pad
Lightweight Construction: Made from lightweight, mildew resistant, breathable material that will not trap rain or snow; UV-coated for long life
Reversible Design: Features a unique, reversible design
Easy to Store: Folds easily for storage
Easy to Clean: Cleans easily with soap and water
